title: The Micallef programme [Series 2: episodes 1 - 3]

description: Lawyer turned comedian Shaun Micallef presents his own unique brand of humor in a series of sketches from his program along with fellow comedians Francis Greenslade, Wayne Hope and Roz Hammond. Items from three separate episodes include; Bud Smallhorn, passionate flag maker at the Old Glory Banner Company; Sexpo; Mark Wainwright, blind climber of Mt Everest; the politeness distance indicator; District Attorney Ferguson; Australia's first male Miss Nude Australia; police corruption; farewelling a valued audience member; Dracula who wants to escape the rat race; meals on wheels; the search for the best laundry detergent and the Australian record domino attempt. Guests/special appearances by Tim Rogers, Kevin Harrington and Glenn Robbins.
